name: Cape Fear Aviation Flight Training
about: Cape Fear Aviation Flight Training, located at Gray's Creek Airport in Fayetteville, NC, is a renowned flight school dedicated to providing comprehensive and personalized flight training. Founded by Dale Smith in 1984, the school has evolved from a small crop dusting operation to a thriving aviation training center. Our team, led by Scot Smith, includes experienced instructors like Elayne Humphrey and Eli Rusk, who are passionate about sharing their knowledge and love for flying. We offer training programs from Private Pilot to Certified Flight Instructor, and we are proud recipients of the AOPA Distinguished Flight School Award for three consecutive years. Our programs are designed to be flexible and affordable, including participation in the U.S. Army Credential Assistance Program. We invite you to join our aviation family and start your flying journey with us.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
